channel.title: Recent Blog Posts
channel.description: Blogger posts from the last 24 hours

item.title: EDI IT Specialist (Support Team) | Product Based MNC
item.description:
EDI IT Specialist (Support Team) | Product Based MNC
Experience: 4+ years (EDI & Sterling Integration)
Location: Hyderabad, India

Requirements:
·      Good practical knowledge of Sterling Integrator
·      Basic EDI mapping experience with Positional, Idocs, XML, X12 and EDIFACT on the IBM B2Bi Sterling Integrator mapper
·      Good understanding of API
·      General and good understanding of EDI system role in organization
·      Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
·      Good communication skills in English both spoken and written
·      Ability to observe and provide constructive feedback
·      IT role awareness and technical documentation needs in global organization
·      Ability to work under pressure and multitasking
·      Good Unix shell command understanding
·      A very good basic network communication protocols understanding (FTP, sFTP, FTPs, HTTP, HTTPs, other)
·      Practical knowledge about using SQLs for data analyses
·      Understanding ITIL principles in organization and Foundation certification would be benefit
·      Good interpersonal and communication skills
·      Able to work across teams and departments
·      Proactive, service oriented and helpfulness
·      Teamwork in an international environment
·      Service minded, like to help others.
·      Minimum 2 years of experience in a similar EDI Support environment

✉️ Kindly share your updated resume on ramsha.haidry@a-square.co.in

item.title: 🚨 Urgent Hiring Alert: Oracle Apps SCM + EDI Consultant Wanted! 🚨
item.description:
🚨 Urgent Hiring Alert: Oracle Apps SCM + EDI Consultant Wanted! 🚨

We are actively hiring skilled Oracle Apps SCM professionals with strong EDI experience for a leading service-based client on a contract basis. If you're looking for an exciting opportunity in a dynamic work environment, we want to hear from you!

💼 Role: Oracle Apps SCM + EDI Consultant
📍 Location: Pune / Bangalore / Hyderabad / Indore
🎓 Education: B.E / B.Tech / Graduate
🧳 Experience: 5 to 10 Years
🏢 Work Mode: Hybrid / Onsite
📝 Job Type: Contractual (6 Months Fixed Term)
🔁 Extension: Based on performance
👥 Openings: 4 Positions
💰 Payroll: Digilogue IT Services
⚡ Notice Period: Immediate to 30 Days Max
💼 Client: Leading Service-Based Company

🧩 Key Responsibilities:
🔹Migrate EDI setups to R12 and validate customer transactions via EDI.
🔹Perform end-to-end EDI testing with strong knowledge of Order Management (OM) and Shipping modules.
🔹Work with Oracle Configurator and Pricing modules.
🔹Demonstrate thorough understanding of EDI file structures and processing.
🔹Apply strong knowledge of EDI standards and protocols (X12, EDIFACT).
🔹Design and implement EDI integrations with trading partners, including data mapping and format translation.

🔍 What We’re Looking For:
🔹Hands-on experience with Oracle SCM and OM modules.
🔹Deep understanding of EDI architecture and integrations.
🔹Strong troubleshooting and communication skills.
🔹Proven track record in similar implementation/support projects.

📩 How to Apply:
👉 Apply directly on LinkedIn -> Avantika Nigam & Soni Singh
👉 Send your CV to: [avantika.nigam@digilogue.co.in]
👉 Use the subject line: "Application for Oracle SCM/OM Consultant with EDI Experience"

🔗 Know Someone Perfect for This Role?
Apply now or Tag someone in the comments who might be a perfect fit for this job role or share this post with your network .
